source: Tax Administration Jamaica (TAJ) / Ministry of Finance & the Public Service

notes.nisCeilingMonthly: NIS monthly insurable wage ceiling (JMD 5M annual / 12)
notes.edTaxEmp: Education Tax Employee rate (applied to statutory income)
notes.edTaxEr: Education Tax Employer rate (applied to statutory income)
notes.incomeTax: Standard income tax rate (up to JMD 6M annual)
notes.incomeTaxHigher: Higher income tax rate (above JMD 6M annual)
notes.higherBracketAnnual: Annual threshold for higher income tax bracket
